channel.title: Does anybody know what this is? PAYING FOR HELP
channel.description:
i use demise-pk source base i got bored and decided to see my work and improvements. i let my friend on and he talks in public chat and: [URL=http://img189.imageshack.us/i/talk1.png/][IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/4746/talk1.png[/img][/URL]
any time someone talks in public all you hear is: ilofifiolofifol
idk if its from the client or the server. but please help me figure this out and link to a tutorial if it can be fixed \.
thanks! (if you sucessfully help me fix this, ill pay you 5$ paypal. add my msn suns375@yahoo.com

item.title: Does anybody know what this is? PAYING FOR HELP
item.dc:creator: @bo_3wais bo 3wais
item.description:
@bo_3wais wrote:

open publicchat.java, try and find something like
"
if(p.chatText.startsWith(“join my”) || p.chatText.startsWith(“Join my”) || p.chatText.startsWith(“Join My”)) {
p.chatText = “I’m a fucking retard”;
}
"
or just something like this in general

Read full topic
